archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0652
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The Collections solution shall enable treatment strategies to include specified Collections actions. Including: 1. Outbound contact 2. Suspend or partial block 3. Disconnect 4. Close 5. Restore ( on payment) 6. Refer to DCA 7. Write-off 8. Update write-off (inc. recalculate based on payments received) 9. Manually add/remove restrictions to some or all devices etc.

properties.value: Comarch will need full set of treatment strategies with information about detailed order of actions to be executed. What kind of action should be triggered for fix services?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
